snippet.title: Wool at the Gates - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2994990?utm_source=yt_reveal_trailer

The official reveal trailer for Wool at the Gates, an upcoming strategy game where you defend your base from hordes of invading sheep. Fight as a hero with powerful abilities or shapeshift into a flying eyeball to traverse the battlefield and command troops. Build your defenses and economy while creating synergies that unlock class bonuses and perks for your hero, troops, and towers.

The sheep invasion starts April 30th, 2025
